name: MEMALOIRS
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 49 in 2 days.

In this game you have to be in the role of a man of 65. You realise it's time to leave behind something that can always remind you of yourself. 

Life in old age is pretty routine. You do the same things over the years. At the same time, each year flows faster and faster.

You write a memoir about yourself. 

But an invisible disease unstable the whole situation. I don't think anyone can read your memoirs but you...
